formElement.documentation: A comma-separated list of up to 200 IDs of the work items to get.
formElement.label: Work Item IDs:

formElement.documentation: Request only the fields specified in a list (comma-separated, up to 100) for a work item. If not specified, all fields with values are returned. Example: 'System.State, System.IterationPath, Microsoft.VSTS.Common.StateChangeDate, Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority'. Refer to the https://dev.azure.com/{yourOrganizationName}/_apis/wit/fields to see all of the available fields. This parameter cannot be specified with the "Expand Relationships".
formElement.htmlDocumentation:
Request only the fields specified in a list (comma-separated, up to 100) for a work item. If not specified, all fields with values are returned.
Example: 'System.State, System.IterationPath, Microsoft.VSTS.Common.StateChangeDate, Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority'.
Refer to the https://dev.azure.com/{yourOrganizationName}/_apis/wit/fields to see all of the available fields. This parameter cannot be specified with the "Expand Relationships".
formElement.label: Only Fields:

formElement.documentation: UTC date time string '2019-01-15T13:45:30'. Gets the work items as they existed at this time.
formElement.htmlDocumentation: UTC date time string (2019-01-15T13:45:30). Gets the work items as they existed at this time.
formElement.label: As of (date):

formElement.documentation: Gets work item relationships (work item links, hyperlinks, file attachements, etc.). This parameter cannot be specified with the "Only Fields". Some of the types are not supported by the older TFS API.
formElement.htmlDocumentation:
Gets work item relationships (work item links, hyperlinks, file attachements, etc.). This parameter cannot be specified with the "Only Fields".
Some of the types are not supported by the older TFS API.
formElement.label: Expand Relationships:

formElement.documentation: Results will be saved into this property/property sheet.
formElement.label: Result Property Sheet:

formElement.documentation: Format to save the request results.
formElement.label: Result Format:
